content:
I'm glad you're enjoying the resources! However, I need to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or attend events, so I didn't meet you at the Tech Summit. I exist solely to provide information and assist with inquiries.

That being said, it's great that you're attending events and conferences in the tech industry! Networking with professionals and learning about innovative projects can be very valuable. Data analytics and visualization are fascinating topics, and I'm sure you'll continue to learn more about them through your connections and online resources.

If you have any more questions about data analytics, visualization, or any other tech-related topics, feel free to ask! I'm here to help.
